moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Escalate SMB Icon LNK Dropper
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module drops a shortcut (LNK file) that has a ICON reference
          existing on the specified remote host, causing SMB and WebDAV
          connections to be initiated from any user that views the shortcut.
author: mubix <mubix@hak5.org>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: LHOST
options.description: Host listening for incoming SMB/WebDAV traffic
